subject: Re: Portable Ghost Box System video
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Mike, one more question for you:

What's the brand of amplified mic you are using and does Radio SHack 
have it, too?  It seems to be a bit better than the amplified lapel 
mic I am using inside my echo chamber.  I am experimenting with two 
mics, as when I added the splitter I couldn't get any audio out of it 
like you do.  It must either be the mic you are using is better, or 
the headphones/earbuds you use are amplified (??).

Thanks,

LC


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" 
<michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
>
> I have produced another video, this one of my completed portable 
Ghost 
> Box System (Mike's Box 12.470)
> This video, in three parts on YouTube walks you through how the 
chamber 
> system works, while describing the components and going through the 
> description of how to control the devices with the chamber closed.
> 
> Video - Portable Ghost Box System Part 1 of 3
> http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eUOkWGrz94s
